* Tanaka & Amaliah (2022) Current state and prospects of R-packages for the design of experiments [<i class="fa-solid fa-file-pdf"></i>](https://arxiv.org/abs/2206.07532) [<i class="fa-solid fa-file-circle-plus"></i>](https://arxiv.org/src/2206.07532v1/anc/supp.pdf) [<i class="fa-brands fa-github"></i>](https://github.com/emitanaka/paper-DoE-review)
* Statistical Society of Australia Victorian Branch Annual Report 2021 [<i class="fa-solid fa-file-pdf"></i>](https://www.statsoc.org.au/resources/Documents/Branch%20Folders/Victoria%20Branch/annual-report-2021.pdf)
* Tanaka, Leung & Cook (2022) Commentary on “Visualization in Operations Management Research”: Incorporating Statistical Thinking into Visualization Practices for Decision Making in Operational Management. *INFORMS Journal on Data Science* [<i class="fa-solid fa-link"></i>](https://doi.org/10.1287/ijds.2021.0008) [<i class="fa-brands fa-github"></i>](https://github.com/emitanaka/supp-visOM)

* **An anthology of experimental designs** (organised by Rohan Alexander as part of Toronto Data Workshop) [<i class="fab fa-youtube"></i>](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFdZb89Th9g) [<i class="fas fa-link"></i>](https://emitanaka.org/slides/toronto2022) [<i class="fab fa-github"></i>](https://github.com/emitanaka/talks/tree/master/Toronto2022)
* **Constructing experimental designs with the edibble R-package** (organised by Fazel Almasi with funding from Intellectual Climate Fund La Trobe University) [<i class="fas fa-play-circle"></i>](https://doi.org/10.26181/6194952b80356) [<i class="fas fa-link"></i>](https://emitanaka.org/slides/stats4bio2021/edibble/)
* **Visualising experimental designs with the edibble and deggust R-packages** (organised by Fazel Almasi with funding from Intellectual Climate Fund La Trobe University) [<i class="fas fa-play-circle"></i>](https://doi.org/10.26181/6192f76029618) [<i class="fas fa-link"></i>](https://emitanaka.org/slides/stats4bio2021/deggust/)



## <i class="fas fa-comment"></i> Upcoming talks

<ul>
```{r upcoming-talks, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "asis"}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)
df <- readxl::read_xlsx("../cv/data/work-records.xlsx", "talks") %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) %>% 
  arrange(date) %>% 
  filter(date > Sys.Date(),
         advertised=="yes") %>% 
  select(date, title, host, rego_url) 
if(nrow(df)) {
  glue_data(df, '<li>{title}<div style="font-size:0.8em;">[<i>{host}</i>](({rego_url}))</div><div style="font-size:0.8em;">{date}</div></li>')
} else {
  cat("I have no advertised upcoming talks. Please feel free to [invite me](mailto:emi.tanaka@monash.edu) for a talk if I do something of your interest. You can find some of my past talks [here](https://emitanaka.org/talks/).")
}
```
</ul>
